title: Project Initiation and Requirements Gathering
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to elicit and document project requirements. Define project scope, timelines, budget, and resource allocation. Ensure alignment with technical feasibility and consider potential ethical implications, particularly focusing on the balance between productivity enhancement and user safety. Prepare a comprehensive project proposal for review, detailing potential risks and mitigation strategies.

title: Design the Conceptual Architecture
description: Develop a high-level design of the NeuralTimeDilationInducer device, including hardware and software components.

title: Develop Neural Algorithms for Time Dilation
description: Research, design, and implement algorithms that can induce subjective time dilation.

title: Create User Interface for Device Control
description: Design and implement an intuitive user interface for controlling the device.

title: Implement Database for Device Management and Monitoring
description: Develop a database to store and manage device information, user profiles, and performance metrics.

title: Integrate Hardware and Software Components
description: Assemble the hardware components and integrate them with the software modules.
dependencies: Develop Neural Algorithms for Time Dilation
Create User Interface for Device Control
Implement Database for Device Management and Monitoring

title: Perform Unit Testing on Individual Components
description: Test each component of the device to ensure it functions correctly.
dependencies: Develop Neural Algorithms for Time Dilation
Create User Interface for Device Control
Implement Database for Device Management and Monitoring

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Test the complete system to ensure all components work together as expected.
dependencies: Perform Unit Testing on Individual Components

title: Document the Device and Its Usage
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and safety guidelines for the device.

title: Address Security Concerns
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and device functionality.

title: Prepare for User Testing and Feedback
description: Finalize the device for user testing. Gather feedback, incorporate changes, iterate as necessary while ensuring stability, security, and thorough documentation before releasing it for testing. Task includes: (1) Finalizing device setup, (2) Setting up user test environment, (3) Collecting and analyzing user feedback, (4) Making necessary design/functional adjustments based on the analysis.
dependencies: Document the Device and Its Usage
